title: Eiffel Forum License v2.0 (EFL-2.0)
description: A short, sweet, and permissive license that provides a minimal amount of protection for the author.

must.title: Include Copyright
must.description: Describes whether the original copyright must be retained.

must.title: Include License
must.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

cannot.title: Hold Liable
cannot.description: Describes the warranty and if the software/license owner can be charged for damages.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Sublicense
can.description: Describes the ability for you to grant/extend a license to the software.

can.title: Relicense
can.description: Describes the ability to freely relicense the software.

fulltext:
Eiffel Forum License, version 2

1. Permission is hereby granted to use, copy, modify and/or distribute this package, provided that:
- copyright notices are retained unchanged,
- any distribution of this package, whether modified or not, includes this license text.

2. Permission is hereby also granted to distribute binary programs which depend on this package. If the binary program depends on a modified version of this package, you are encouraged to publicly release the modified version of this package.


THIS PACKAGE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTY. ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS BE LIABLE TO ANY PARTY FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS PACKAGE.
